snippet.title: Beats Music Punches, Spotify Counters: Let The Streaming Wars Begin
snippet.description: Beats Music is being launched today to much fanfare and rightfully so. Using “music curation” as its main calling card, it’s a different take on a theme used by other competitive services. Whether the public views that as a good enough reason to shell out their $9.95 a month, we’ll [...] read »

snippet.title: One Thing That Got Me Here: Tips From Successful Women In Business, Music, Technology, Culinary Arts And More
snippet.description: What’s the #1 attribute that helped you get where you are in your career? Inspiring answers from 13 women at the top of their games.

snippet.title: How Does Producer Danger Mouse Create Original Music For Broken Bells, Beck And Gnarls Barkely? By 'Copying Somebody Else'
snippet.description: Listening to Gorillaz’ Demon Days, Gnarls Barkely’s St. Elsewhere, Beck’s Modern Guilt and Norah Jones’ Little Broken Hearts among many others, there are few telltale signs that those albums were all produced by the same person. But like the cartoon superhero that provided his stage name, Danger Mouse, the key [...] read »

snippet.title: Sin City's Latest Savior: Electronic Dance Music
snippet.description: From shows to theme parks, Las Vegas has always figured out a way to bounce back. The new white knight: million-dollar DJs spinning at mega-nightclubs. read »
